page.title: 09A School Day
page.content: I rise at 7a.m,dress and go downstairs to watch breakfast T.V. until my breakfast is ready at 8a.m. Then,I wash and prepare my school bag. I walk to school and arrive at 8.45 . After assembly I go to my classroom and work for an hour at Maths.and French. After French we have a break of 15 mins After break we have singing followed by English till 12.30, when some of the class go to dinner.I'm on third sitting so before lunch I play table tennis. Afterwards we have science followed by the last of the breaks in which I get changed for games.The girls play rounders and the boys play cricket till 3.30 .Some children stay after school for extra coaching.At home I do my homework,eat dinner,watch T.V.or go outside.I go to bed at 9.30 p.m.
